title: Is it legal to pursue two master’s degree (both in distance) from IGNOU simultaneously? - Quora

response.answer_text: University permits to study a diploma or certificate along with aUG\PG. Accordingly u can study a PG DIPLOMA or Certificate Course only. It is Illegal to study both Masters in same or in different universities.
No this is illegal as per UGC norm.The degrees will not be accepted.
